Articles.Content:
A local airfield (I can see an occasional prop plane take-off/land from my porch) was having a labor day picnic today, and I saw this on their bulletin board. I also saw a pilot who looked kinda like Chris Hadfield with a bigger moustache and longer nose. The reason why I'm posting this is because most of these mechanic's answers seem very Kerbal. I don't guarantee that the info is true, because I'm not qualified to guarantee that the info is true. Link because forum autoformat turns it into a wall of text: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NyCDp6uGak9eZY5mV4V3JXxsJVPaxy4PrtvTeDFz7ho/pub

Edited August 31, 2013 by Flymetothemun
Damned auto-format
S: Auto-format is not installed on this forum. On a more serious note, nice find, rather funny.

S: Auto-format is not installed on this forum. On a more serious note, nice find, rather funny.
It must be my comp, because the editor buttons don't show up (I set the editor to be WSIWYG) and lists are always compressed into massive text walls. I recently got it serviced because of a bad Hard Drive.
No, they updated the forum, and everything's a bit messed up right now.
This is pretty funny, thanks for sharing!
Some of those are hilarious! Had some good laughs. Thx
Ah, I remember seeing this years ago. Had forgotten most of it. Always entertaining.
